about_the_game:
Story

Explore a romantic drama inspired by the classic fairy tale "Little Red Riding Hood". Follow Tsuki Ito, a lonely and traumatized boy. However, his life takes an unexpected turn when he gets lost on his first day and encounters a mysterious girl with a radiant presence. Yet, her true nature will only be unveiled with the first light of the moon.

Characters


Features

  • 2 hours of immersive content
  • A dramatic narrative filled with scary moments.
  • Branching storylines based on your choices.
  • Multiple possible endings
  • A drama/horror experience inspired by "Little Red Riding Hood"

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages or for viewing at work: Some violence or blood, graphic adult violent content, non-specific adult content.

short_description: Alone and lost for falling asleep on the first day of school, the only option left for Tsuki Ito is to trust a peculiar-looking girl with a radiant presence. Follow this story of romance and suspense inspired by the classic tale of "Little Red Riding Hood."
supported_languages: English, Portuguese - Brazil, Japanese, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America, Italian, Spanish - Spain, French
